conbody.p: Hive Query executoroverviewexecutorsHive QueryThe Hive Query executor connects to Hive and performs a user-defined Hive or Impala query each time it receives an event record. Use the Hive Query executor as part of an event stream to perform event-driven queries in Hive or Impala.
For example, you can use Hive Query executor to perform the Invalidate Metadata query for Impala as part of the Hive Drift Solution. For more information, see .

When you configure the Hive Query executor, you configure JDBC connection information to Hive, optionally add additional HDFS configuration properties to use, and the Hive or Impala query that you want to run.
